blogPost.title: What does it mean to create a product/service that is truly consumer-first? Answer by John Simms, Founder and CEO @HomeValet. https://t.co/MNGrNAvP3b https://t.co/SYhqukd1Y7
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 创造一个真正消费者至上的产品/服务意味着什么？回答者：John Simms，创始人兼CEO @HomeValet。https://t.co/MNGrNAvP3b https://t.co/SYhqukd1Y7。
創造一個真正消費者至上的產品/服務意味着什麼？回答者：John Simms，創始人兼CEO @HomeValet。https://t.co/MNGrNAvP3b https://t.co/SYhqukd1Y7。
